snippet: More and more university students are choosing to study abroad, according to a new league table ranking the world's top academic institutions. Is it a positive trend and how important are the rankings in picking the right school?
abstract: More and more university students are choosing to study abroad, according to a new league table ranking the world's top academic institutions. Is it a positive trend and how important are the rankings in picking the right school?

headline.main: University Ranking Shows Boom in Global Student Mobility
